price: 你说：“你们真不信在两日内创造大地者，而要为他树立许多匹敌吗？那是众世界的主。”
arabic: ۞ قُلۡ أَئِنَّكُمۡ لَتَكۡفُرُونَ بِٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ فِي يَوۡمَيۡنِ وَتَجۡعَلُونَ لَهُۥٓ أَندَادٗاۚ ذَٰلِكَ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul a-innakum latakfurūna bi-alladhī khalaqa al-arḍa fī yawmayni watajʿalūna lahu andādan dhālika rabbu al-ʿālamīna
